name: SCNParticleBirthDirection
desc: Options for the initial direction of each emitted particle, used by the birthDirection property.

items.name: case constant
items.desc: The emitting direction is the same for all particles.

items.name: case surfaceNormal
items.desc: The emitting direction for each particle is along the surface normal vector at the point where the particle is emitted.

items.name: case random
items.desc: SceneKit randomizes the emitting direction for each particle.
